## Toolbox.createDom\_() method

Creates the DOM for the toolbox.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected createDom_(workspace: WorkspaceSvg): HTMLDivElement;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg_class.md) | The workspace this toolbox is on. |
